body_html:
@saeed68gm Ok I think I understood the context: I should be using this custom tf version only to obtain the android inference library and run the model on the phone. So I'll install it in a separate env and keep my usual tf installation in another one for the trainings and everything else. I reviewed the config accordingly and now it compiles.
( @liangxiao05 I haven't forgot regarding the inference time )
